original_title: Cleanline’s acquisition fortifies its Southern Belt presence
original_body_lines: Cleanline Linen Management, a laundry provider for the tourism sector in Sri Lanka, announced the successful acquisition of Ananke Laundry in Unawatuna. This strategic move fortifies Cleanline’s position as a premier laundry service, expanding its reach to one of the key strategic locations for tourism in the Southern belt of the country, a press release said.

The release adds: “This acquisition is a testament to our dedication to excellence and sustainability. We are excited about the opportunities it presents for Cleanline’s continued growth and service expansion. Together with Ananke Laundry, we look forward to delivering exceptional experiences to our clients in the vibrant Southern belt,” said Anjula Koralagamage, Chief Operating Officer, Cleanline Linen Management Pvt Ltd.
